SELECT p.no, p.giver_no giverNo, p.category_no categoryNo, p.price price, p.discount discount, p.date_avail dateAvail, p.sales_qty salesQty, p.sub_count subCount, p.star star, p.rev_count revCount, p.name name, p.photo photo, p.req_msg reqMsg, p.details details, p.instruction instruction, p.type type, p.regdate regdate, c.name categoryName, (SELECT name FROM categories WHERE (SELECT c.prior_no FROM categories c, products p WHERE c.no = p.category_no AND p.no = #{productNo}) = no) primaryCategoryName
FROM products p, categories c WHERE p.category_no = c.no AND p.no = #{productNo}

SELECT no, giverNo, categoryNo, name, price, discount,realPrice, photo, salesQty, type, subCount, star,revCount, regdate,company, priorNo, categoryName, rownum r FROM(SELECT no, giverNo, categoryNo, name, price, discount,realPrice, photo, salesQty, type, subCount, star,revCount, regdate,company, priorNo, categoryName, rownum r FROM(SELECT p.no no, giver_no giverNo, p.name name, price, discount, price-discount realPrice, photo, sales_qty salesQty, type, sub_count subCount, star, rev_count revCount, p.regdate regdate, g.company company, c.prior_no priorNo, c.no categoryNo, c.name categoryName FROM products p, givers g, categories c WHERE p.giver_no = g.no AND c.no = p.category_no AND c.no = #{categoryNo})) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
